about_the_game:
Join players worldwide in sweeping through 10 million mines across a 48 million tile minefield and leave your mark! The "Launch Celebration" Skin Pack brings you a variety of game interfaces and flag options, giving you a unique Minesweeper experience.

With seaside elements, feel the refreshing sea breeze and the comfort of the beach while sweeping mines. Hurry and enjoy this unique seaside Minesweeper journey!

Unlock the following content with the "Launch Celebration" DLC Skin Pack:

1. A set of seaside-themed top, tile surface, and tile bottom
2. 5 different flag skins
3. An exclusive "Celebration Mine" emoji
4. 10,000 points (redeemable for free skins)

DLC Instructions

1. After purchasing this DLC from the Steam store, the content will be automatically unlocked and available upon logging into the game.
2. Players who purchase the DLC in-game need to restart the game to access the DLC content.

With seaside elements, feel the refreshing sea breeze and the comfort of the beach while sweeping mines. Hurry and enjoy this unique seaside Minesweeper journey!

Unlock the following content with the "Launch Celebration" DLC Skin Pack:

1. A set of seaside-themed top, tile surface, and tile bottom
2. 5 different flag skins
3. An exclusive "Celebration Mine" emoji
4. 10,000 points (redeemable for free skins)

DLC Instructions

1. After purchasing this DLC from the Steam store, the content will be automatically unlocked and available upon logging into the game.
2. Players who purchase the DLC in-game need to restart the game to access the DLC content.
